info.title: Stratify API
info.description: API documentation for the Stratify project

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, and returns an access token.
Invalidates the current user's access token, effectively logging them out.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all notifications for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

get.description: Retrieves a single notification by its ID. Requires authentication and authorization to ensure the user can only view their own notifications.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: ID of the notification to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to view this notification.

put.description: Marks a specific notification as read. The notification ID is provided in the URL.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: ID of the notification to mark as read

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to mark this notification as read.

delete.description: Deletes a single notification by its ID. Requires authentication and authorization to ensure the user can only delete their own notifications.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: ID of the notification to delete

204.description: Successful operation. No content to return.

403.description: Forbidden: Not authorized to delete this notification.

get.description: Checks if the authenticated user has any unread notifications.

is_read.description: True if no unread notifications exist, false otherwise.

get.summary: Get reviews for a specific user
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of reviews for a user by their ID. This endpoint is publicly accessible.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user to get reviews for

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Creates a new review for a user. The logged-in user's ID is used as the reviewer.

success.example: Your review for 123 has been saved.

403.description: Forbidden: Cannot review yourself.

delete.description: Deletes a review. This action is restricted to the original reviewer or an admin.

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: ID of the review to delete

success.example: Your review for 123 has been deleted.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this review.

patch.description: Updates a review. Only the user who created the review can update it.

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: ID of the review to update

success.example: Your review for 123 has been updated.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this review.

get.summary: Get a list of all categories
get.description: Retrieves a list of all categories.

post.description: Creates a new category. Requires superadmin privileges.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to create categories (e.g., not a superadmin).

messages: You are not authorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Get a single category by ID
get.description: Retrieves a single category by its ID.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

delete.description: Deletes a category by its ID. Requires superadmin privileges.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete categories (e.g., not a superadmin).

messages: You are not authorized to perform this action.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all problems. This endpoint is accessible to authenticated users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.summary: Register a new problem with associated skills
post.description: Creates a new problem entry, including its title, description, budget, timeline, and a list of required skills. The authenticated user must be a 'company' role.

company_id.description: ID of the company user creating the problem.

description.example: We need an iOS and Android e-commerce application with payment gateway integration.

budget.description: Budget for the problem in base currency units.

timeline_value.description: Numerical value for the timeline (e.g., 3 for '3 months').

skills.description: Array of required skills for the problem.

example.title: Develop a Mobile E-commerce App
example.description: We need an iOS and Android e-commerce application with payment gateway integration.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to register a problem (e.g., not a company user).

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for problem or skills.

get.summary: Get all problems for a company
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all problems for a company. This endpoint is accessible to authenticated company users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this company's problems. (e.g., not a company user).

get.summary: Get a single problem by ID
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific problem, including its skills.

parameters.name: problem
parameters.description: ID of the problem to retrieve

delete.description: Deletes a problem and its associated skills. Only the company that owns the problem or a super admin can perform this action.

parameters.name: problem
parameters.description: ID of the problem to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this problem.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing problem and its associated skills. Only the company that owns the problem or a super admin can perform this action.

parameters.name: problem
parameters.description: ID of the problem to update

requestBody.description: Problem data to update, including skills. All fields are optional except for skills, which should be provided as a complete list to synchronize.

skills.description: Array of skills to synchronize. This will replace the old skill list.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this problem.

get.summary: Get all projects for the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of projects where the authenticated user is either the company or the provider. Admins see all projects.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Creates a new project after a proposal has been accepted. The authenticated user must be the company owner of the problem or a super admin.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to create this project.

get.summary: Get a single project by ID
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific project. Accessible to the project's company, provider, or an admin.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: ID of the project to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this project.

delete.description: Deletes a project. Only the company that owns the project or a super admin can perform this action.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: ID of the project to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this project.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing project. Only the company that owns the project or a super admin can perform this action.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: ID of the project to update

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this project.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all proposals. Accessible to authenticated users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Allows a 'provider' user to submit a new proposal with associated PDF documents. Supports both JSON (without files) and multipart/form-data (with files).

provider_id.description: ID of the provider submitting the proposal

problem_id.description: ID of the problem the proposal is for

description.example: This proposal outlines a full-stack solution using React and Laravel.

provider_id.description: ID of the provider submitting the proposal

problem_id.description: ID of the problem the proposal is for

description.example: This proposal outlines a full-stack solution using React and Laravel.

docs[].description: An array of PDF files to be uploaded.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to create a proposal for this provider ID.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific proposal, including its associated documents. The user must be the provider who submitted the proposal, the company that posted the problem, or an admin.

parameters.name: proposal
parameters.description: ID of the proposal

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this proposal.

delete.description: Deletes a proposal by ID. The user must be the provider or an admin. This will also delete all associated files from storage.

parameters.name: proposal
parameters.description: ID of the proposal to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this proposal.

patch.description: Updates a proposal by ID. The user must be the provider or an admin. It supports both JSON (without files) and multipart/form-data (with files).

parameters.name: proposal
parameters.description: ID of the proposal to update

docs[].description: A new array of PDF files to be uploaded, which will replace all previous documents. This field is optional.

_method.description: For form-data requests, this field is used to specify the HTTP method.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this proposal.

get.summary: Get all transactions for the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of transactions. Access is limited to the company or provider involved, or to an admin.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

post.description: Creates a new transaction for a project. Only the project's company or a super admin can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to create a transaction for this project.

404.description: Not Found: The specified project was not found.

get.summary: Get a single transaction by ID
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific transaction. Accessible to the transaction's company, provider, or an admin.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: ID of the transaction to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this transaction.

delete.description: Deletes a transaction. This action is restricted to admins only.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: ID of the transaction to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this transaction.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of all users
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all registered users. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view all users.

get.summary: Get user details by ID or slug
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific user by their ID or slug. A user can view their own profile, or an admin can view any user's profile. Includes categories and portfolio links if applicable.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to retrieve

categories.description: List of categories for the user.

portfolio_links.description: List of portfolio links for 'provider' users.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this user.

delete.description: Deletes a user by their ID or slug. A user can delete their own account, or an admin can delete any user's account.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this user.

patch.description:
Updates the details of an existing user. A user can update their own profile, or a super admin can update any user's profile.
     * Sensitive fields like 'is_admin', 'is_active', and 'role' are ignored/discarded if sent in the request body, and 'password' is handled separately for updates.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to update

requestBody.description: User data to update. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

image_url.description: Set to null to remove existing image.
User's profile image file (e.g., .jpg, .png). Send as empty string for removal.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this user.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
username: The username is already taken by another user.

post.description:
Registers a new user with the 'company' role. Sensitive fields like 'is_admin', 'is_active', and 'role' 
     * cannot be set by the client for this endpoint.

requestBody.description: User registration data. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

description.description: User's description (for provider roles, if applicable).
User's description (for provider roles, if applicable).

403.description: Forbidden: Unauthorized key (e.g., is_admin, is_active, role) provided by client.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
password: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description:
Registers a new user with the 'provider' role. Sensitive fields like 'is_admin', 'is_active', and 'role' 
     * cannot be set by the client for this endpoint.

requestBody.description: User registration data. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

403.description: Forbidden: Unauthorized key (e.g., is_admin, is_active, role) provided by client.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
password: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description:
Registers a new user with the 'admin' role and sets 'is_admin' to true. Requires super super admin privileges for the authenticated user. 
     * Sensitive fields like 'is_active' and 'role' ('admin') cannot be set by the client for this endpoint.

requestBody.description: Admin user registration data. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

403.description: Forbidden: Unauthorized key (e.g., is_active, incorrect role) provided, or authenticated user lacks privileges to create an an admin.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
password: The password confirmation does not match.

patch.description: Updates the portfolio links for a specific user. Only the user themselves or a super admin can update these links. The target user must have the 'provider' role.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user whose portfolio links are to be updated.

requestBody.description: Array of portfolio links (URLs) to associate with the user. Existing links not in this array will be deleted, and new ones will be added.

links.description: An array of valid URLs representing the user's portfolio links.

400.description: Bad Request: Portfolio links can only be updated for users with the 'provider' role.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update portfolio links for this user.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for portfolio links.

items.example: The links.0 field must be a valid URL.

patch.description: Synchronizes a user's categories with a new list. Old categories are removed, and new ones are added.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to update

requestBody.description: List of category IDs to associate with the user

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update categories for this user.
